mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PRODUCT_DTL ( BAR_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_TYPE_NM, PRODUCT_TYPE_CD, SUPPLIER, PURCHASE_PRICE, UPDATE_DT, CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #{productBarCode}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, 'TEST', 'TEST', #{supplier}, #{purchasePrice}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT BAR_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_TYPE_NM, PRODUCT_TYPE_CD, SUPPLIER, PURCHASE_PRICE, UPDATE_DT, CREATE_DT FROM T_PRODUCT_DTL WHERE 1=1 AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{productName}, '%') ORDER BY CREATE_DT DESC
